product_name: Nikon D5600 Kit (AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-140 mm F/3.5-5.6G ED VR Lens) 24.2 MP DSLR Camera (Black) + FREE Nikon DSLR Bag + 16GB Memory Card

reviews:
Product is original and genuine except the box.
Camera was from right box 18-55 + 70-300 lens kit. But I have ordered 18-140 lens and got camera and lens 18-140 in 18-55 + 70-300 kit.

They do not mention the serial no of lens in invoice. Please make sure they do otherwise warranty wont be valid for lens as asked in Nikon authorized service center.

product_name: Swiss Military CAM1 Wanderer Sports & Action Camera (Black, 12 MP) with Waterproof Case

reviews:
I would rate it as 3 star because

Recording quality is ok
it records long clips in multiple smaller clips.

cannot be mounted on helmet properly.
Swiss military customer service is pathetic.

description.About The Product: Records full HD 1080p video at 30 fps. Captures 12MP still photos Ultra-wide 120 ° lens. Camera housing waterproof to 30M. Built-In 2.0? LCD Screen (16:9). Records to microSD/HC Memory Cards. Micro USB port. 900mAh Lithium-Ion battery pack. Multiple mounts included. Expandable memory upto 32gb (Not Included) 6 Month warranty cover against any manufacturing defect
description.Key Features:
The New Waterproof Wanderer Full HD 12 MP Action Camera is the next big thing no matter where you go. Being compact it packs a super punch with a host of features bundled within.                                                                                   

Armed with an ultra-wide 120 degree "fisheye" lens, the camera captures practically everything happening in front and around.  Being water-proof upto 30 meters, you may take the  Wanderer  wherever you go without a care in the world. Now take breath-taking shots under water and dazzle away your friends!  

With the included multiple mounts and plastic casing and a 900mAh and both still and video modes, now go crazy capturing all those beautiful moments without a care in the world.
